overview.en: The core of Zioncoin is the protocol for payment systems. This blockchain-based decentralized network consists of mutually-independent, trusted gateways, where information is distributed in different server networks, to offer a safer, cheaper and more decentralized payment method. Our mission is to become an important part of global business by providing users all over the world a trusted, transparent and decentralized payment network protocol. Zioncoin currently operates on the Ethereum blockchain. The Zioncoin token is a digital asset totaling 841.9 billion. After Zioncoin's main network goes online line, it will be mapped 1:1 with the primary network's native assets.
overview.zh: Zioncoin的核心是为支付系统提供协议，其通过区块链打造去中心化的网络由人们信任的网关组成，这些网关是互相独立运行的，传输的信息分散在不同服务器网络中，组成一个更快、更安全、更廉价和更分散的支付方式。Zioncoin的使命是成为全球商业的强大力量，为全球所有用户提供一个可靠、透明和去中心化支付网络协议。目前Zioncoin是在以太坊区块链上运行。Zioncoin代币作为数字资产，总量8419亿，Zioncoin主网上线后将与主网原生资产进行1:1映射。
